definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Objective To learn the situation of supervision and management of pulmonary tuberculosis(TB) patients by village doctors and its influential factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解村醫生督導管理肺結核病人現狀及影響因素。

sentences.english: Objective To test the efficacy of rifapention on treating patients with pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的驗證利福噴丁治療肺結核病的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the treatment effects of smear-positive cases with pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析塗陽肺結核病人的化療效果。

sentences.english: The delayed rate of newly registered smear positive patients was over 64%.
sentences.chinese: 新登塗陽肺結核病人延誤爲64%以上。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the source of smear-positive patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析塗陽肺結核病人轉診情況。

sentences.english: No matter what it does, the signal says this one has TB.
sentences.chinese: 無論這隻老鼠做什麼，信號都顯示它患有肺結核病。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze outcomes of pulmonary tuberculosis prevention and control in Henan Normal University students.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析河南師大學生肺結核病預防控制效果。

sentences.english: JUNE SUGIYAMA: "Especially TB medication needs to be kept in a certain temperature."
sentences.chinese: 特別是治療肺結核病的藥物需要控制在特定的溫度。

sentences.english: We now know the identity of the federally-quarantined tuberculosis patient.
sentences.chinese: 現已確認了被聯邦調查局隔離的肺結核病者的身份。

sentences.english: Objective To study clinic characteristic of pregnancy with acute miliary pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討妊娠合併急性粟粒型肺結核病的臨牀特徵。

sentences.english: Tuberculosis can be reactivated by overwork.
sentences.chinese: 肺結核病可以由於過度勞累而復發。

sentences.english: History of contact with T. B. patients?

sentences.chinese: 肺結核病曾經一度廣泛流行。

sentences.english: TB is a bacterial infection that predominantly attacks the lungs.
sentences.chinese: 肺結核病是由細菌感染引發的，它主要侵蝕肺部。

sentences.english: The effect of lotus root are Qingfei bleeding, tuberculosis patients are advised to eat.
sentences.chinese: 蓮藕還有清肺止血的功效，肺結核病人最宜食用。

sentences.english: And there is still no vaccine able to prevent pulmonary TB, the most common form of the disease.
sentences.chinese: 目前仍無疫苗能夠預防最常見的肺結核病。
